front.title: Peer Prefix Limits Exchange in BGP

abstract.t: This document proposes a mechanism to allow BGP peers to coordinatethe setting of a limit on the number of prefixes which one BGPspeaker will send to its peer. Coordination can prevent disruptionof the peering session or discarding of routes, which can occur whena maximum prefix limit is configured on the 'receiving' peer, and the'sending' peer exceeds the limit.
